title: tandai tAi
sahitya:
tandai tAi vErevar aiyanE tALinaip-paNi tamiyEnukk-unaiyaladu


anupallavi

  edaiyE en iLamai mudal EzhaiyEn cintai amarnda kuzhandai skandA


caraNam    azhagiya mayil vAhana amarEshA asurar paDai azhitta shivakumarEshA
kizhavaDivODu vanNda vaLLee kAntA gIta kinkiNi paDAravinda en
